title: On dynamical behaviors in the fractional generalized Langevin equation
abstract:
The focus of our study in this paper is on the active dynamics and a
fractional generalized Langevin equation with a memory kernel K(t). The
Fokker-Planck equation is obtained by deriving it from a second-order
differential equation. The joint probability density we obtained enables us to
calculate various statistical quantities such as mean squared displacement and
mean squared velocity in different three-time domains.
